configs.name: Modern Dark
configs.author: DesignPro
configs.description: A sleek dark theme with subtle animations and modern design elements. Perfect for developers who work in low-light environments with optimized contrast for long coding sessions.

configs.name: Light Minimal
configs.author: MinimalStudio
configs.description: Clean and minimal light theme that reduces visual clutter while maintaining functionality. Features subtle shadows and gentle transitions for a calming experience.

configs.name: Vibrant Colors
configs.author: ColorMaster
configs.description: Bold and vibrant theme with beautiful gradient effects and eye-catching animations. Brings personality and energy to your desktop with carefully selected color palettes.

configs.name: Professional Blue
configs.author: CorpDesign
configs.description: Professional blue theme perfect for business environments with subtle animations. Maintains a corporate aesthetic while providing modern functionality and elegant transitions.

configs.name: Neon Dark
configs.author: NeonStudio
configs.description: Futuristic dark theme with neon accents and glowing effects for a cyberpunk feel. Perfect for gamers and tech enthusiasts who want a cutting-edge aesthetic.
